name: Dungless 2
description:
The new adventures of the young conqueror of the treasury and thunderstorms of monsters are ready! In the new part you are waiting for more dungeons, monsters and unique features!
This time you go on a trip with a full combat arsenal: blast the caves bombs, shoot the monsters from the bow and cut the ancient relics with your whip!



Dungless 2 - procedural-generated 2D world, which creates a unique experience in every race. Completely in the power of random events, he can deliver you a lot of adventures and gold finds or catch you in the environment of enemies and limited spaces where you break your way with explosions and cut off parts of monsters!



Features:
- Random Game Level Generation
- Infinite game
- Pixel Art.
